Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Square
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpawnSquare, TurretSquare
    public abstract class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a square of the game board

        northConnection - is the north connection

        southConnection - is the south connection
        westConnection - is the west connection
        row - is the row of the square
        col - is the column of the square
        color - is the color of the square
        type - is the type of the square used for deserialization
